name: rc-car
description: Simple RcCar created from Raspberry Pi Zero 2W

scripts.build: mkdir -p build && minify static/index.html > build/index.html && minify static/style.css > build/style.css && minify static/control.js > build/control.js && cp src/*.py build/
scripts.build:ota: npm run build && cd build && tar -czf ../ota.tar.gz *.py *.html *.js *.css && cd ..
